thread.title: Milan in bizarre Deulofeu U-turn as Everton deny deal
thread.title_full: Milan in bizarre Deulofeu U-turn as Everton deny deal

title: Milan in bizarre Deulofeu U-turn as Everton deny deal
text:
0 Jan 20, 2017 4:32:01 PM The Serie A club had confirmed the loan signing of the Toffees winger on Friday but have now deleted all evidence of the announcement 
Hours after they had announced the signing of Gerard Deulofeu on loan, AC Milan have deleted all evidence of a deal for the Everton winger. 
Milan revealed on Twitter on Friday that they had acquired the Spaniard on a temporary basis until the end of the campaign, but there was no such confirmation from the Toffees. 
RUMOURS: Milan still want Wilshere 
According to Sky Sports , Everton are furious that the Serie A club claimed the deal had been concluded and maintain that talks are still ongoing. 
At the time of writing, neither club had made a public statement on the status of the transfer. 
Previously, reports have claimed that Milan's move for the Barcelona academy graduate had stalled due to the two clubs' failure to agree a loan fee. 
Deulofeu has made just four Premier League starts for Everton this season having fallen out of favour under new manager Ronald Koeman. GERARD DEULOFEU || AC MILAN || SKILLS + GOALS + HIGHLIGHTS 2017 pic.twitter.com/TJfHqkTXMj
